project.name: ExecutionEngineManager
project.description:
ExecutionEngineManager is responsible for managing the lifecycle, configuration, and initialization of various data processing execution engines such as Apache Spark and Apache Flink.
It acts as a centralized entry point to abstract away engine-specific setup logic, enabling seamless switching or extension of compute engines based on application configuration or runtime requirements.
Core responsibilities include: - Creating and configuring execution engine instances (e.g., SparkSession, FlinkEnvironment) - Managing shared resources and settings across engines - Providing a uniform interface for interacting with different engine types
This abstraction allows application components to remain decoupled from the specifics of the underlying compute engine, promoting modularity and extensibility.
